abstract: In the battle to determine which high-definition DVD format will become the next standard, Toshiba is hoping the third time’s a charm.

lead_paragraph: In the battle to determine which high-definition DVD format will become the next standard, Toshiba is hoping the third time’s a charm.

headline.main: Circuits: And in This Corner, a Third-Generation HD DVD Player
